name: Swampedge
description: You enter an enormous, smelly swamp. The sunlight is blocked by thick, entangled trees. Rice grows wild here. The path leads into a dark wooded area.

name: Swampwood
description: The swamp grows dark under the tree canopy. The sound of bugs and swamp creatures is disorienting. You'd need to be a skilled pathfinder to make it any deeper.

name: Sawoka
description: A small abandoned village sits hidden among the vines. Trees sprout from the doorways of the buildings that circle a central mound, which seems to be full of coal. One of the houses contains a staircase leading into a labyrinth.

name: Strange Wall
description: The wall here is carved into a huge art piece. The art is covered in small holes that seem like they might fit a small key.

buildings.name: Wakanidsko's Room
buildings.description: You enter a large, well lit space littered with papers and books. A large bed sits in one corner and a kitchen space sits in the other. A very strange looking man is sitting at a desk writing something.
